a149-1.description: Monitor cost trend — last 20 avg $2.36, threshold $2.50
a149-1.evidence: Cost trend reversed. Last 20 avg dropped from $2.36 (A#149) to $2.26 (A#150). Last 5 avg is $1.62 (↓ decreasing). B sessions since A#149 avg $1.35 (down from $2.73). R sessions since A#149 avg $2.27 (down from $2.91). wq-654 completed at s1533 with analysis showing no structural issue — high-cost sessions were justified one-offs.
